options.label: Text value
options.info: The value that's going to be transformed

Select the type of transformation. Downcase: Transforms all characters of a string to lowercase. Upcase: Transforms all the letters of a string to uppercase. Capitalize: Transforms the first letter of a string to a capital, everything else is lowercase. Parameterize: Transforms a string to a parameter, making it a URL-friendly value.
